member.name: M:OpenMcdf.Extensions.CFStreamExtension.AsIOStream(OpenMcdf.CFStream)
member.summary: Return the current CFStream object as a Stream object.

member.name: M:OpenMcdf.Extensions.OlePropertiesExtensions.AsOLEPropertiesContainer(OpenMcdf.CFStream)
member.summary: Returns Stream as an OLE Properties container (see [MS-OLEPS] document for specifications). Stream is usually a SummaryInfo or a DocumentSummaryInfo compound stream. Application specific properties stream are also supported. Properties can be added, removed and modified.
member.param: Compound Stream to be read as OLE properties container
member.returns: Ole properties container to enumerate and manipulate properties

member.summary: Write the dictionary and all its values into the specified .
member.remarks: Based on the Microsoft specifications at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-oleps/99127b7f-c440-4697-91a4-c853086d6b33
member.param: A writer to write the dictionary into.

member.param: The type of property to create.
The name of the new property.

member.name: M:OpenMcdf.Extensions.OLEProperties.OLEPropertiesContainer.CreateUserDefinedProperties(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new UserDefinedProperties container within this container.
member.remarks: Only containers of type DocumentSummaryInfo can contain user defined properties.
member.param: The code page to use for the user defined properties.
member.exception: If this container is a type that doesn't suppose user defined properties.
